name: Inventing the wheel
description:
Important: HTML version will only work on desktop.

This is just a silly game/toy for honing my Godot development skills.

How to play:

  1. For cutting click/touch outside the wheel, drag through it and release.
  2. Once you are happy with the wheel, press the V button to release
  3. Check how far you get!

I've only tested the windows version so far, let me know if you find any issue.

You can find the source code at https://github.com/Parka/Inventing-the-wheel
